data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Saint John Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint John Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 660 believers in Saint John Capisterre, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 660 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,340 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Saint John Capisterre, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sadlers
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sadlers, Saint John Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Spirit, please defend the 660 believers in Saint John Capisterre against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Saint John Capisterre that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.focus_label: Saint John Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 660 believers in Saint John Capisterre to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Saint John Capisterre
location.full_name: Saint John Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
